'''Vahid's Kneaded Onigiri''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained after the completion of the {{Quest|In Another Land}}.

Similar to the [[Tea Break Pancake Cooked by Lily]], it is possible to "use" the item, but doing so will remove it from the player's inventory, and it will have no effect on the player's characters.<!--checked: it does not 'transform' into Onigiri-->
